templates.name: azure-eventhubs-to-tcp
templates.description: The azure-eventhubs-to-tcp template provides functionality to transfer, filter/transform and send from Azure Event Hubs to a TCP listener, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: batchjob
templates.description: The batchjob template allows the execution of non-interactive commands and scripts against a schedule.

templates.name: db-to-db
templates.description: The db-to-db template provides functionality to transfer, filter/transform and update data between databases using JDBC, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: db-to-tcp
templates.description: The db-to-tcp template provides functionality to transfer, filter/transform and update data between a database (using JDBC) and a TCP Listener, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: file-to-tcp
templates.description: The file-to-tcp template provides functionality to read a files contents and forward it on to a TCP listener, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: file-watch-to-command
templates.description: The file-watch-to-command template provides functionality to execute a command when a CREATE | MODIFY | DELETE event occurs on a file or files within a specified location.

templates.name: rabbitmq-to-tcp
templates.description: The rabbitmq-to-tcp template provides functionality to transfer, filter/transform and send from a RabbitMQ queue to a TCP listener, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: rest-to-tcp
templates.description: The rest-to-tcp template provides functionality to query, filter/transform and send from HTTP requests to a TCP listener, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: restclient-to-dbtable
templates.description: The azure-eventhubs-to-tcp template provides functionality to transfer, filter/transform and send from Azure Event Hubs to a TCP listener, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: ssh-to-tcp
templates.description: The ssh-to-tcp template provides functionality to transfer, filter/transform and send output from an SSH remote command to a TCP listener, via an integration-hub pipeline.

templates.name: syslog-to-tcp
templates.description: The syslog-to-tcp template creates a syslog listener that client applications can target to transfer data via a syslog. The integration-hub pipeline transfers, filters/transforms and updates the data, passing it out to the target TCP Listener.

templates.name: webhook-to-db
templates.description: The webhook-to-db template provides a secure HTTP endpoint that 3rd Party applications can target to transfer data via a webhook. The integration-hub pipeline transfers, filters/transforms and updates the data, sending it on to the target database using JDBC.

templates.name: webhook-to-tcp
templates.description: The webhook-to-tcp template provides a secure HTTP endpoint that 3rd Party applications can target to transfer data via a webhook. The integration-hub pipeline transfers, filters/transforms and updates the data, passing it out to the target TCP Listener.
